    • Uses of ITexture in org.andengine.opengl.texture.render

      Classes in org.andengine.opengl.texture.render that implement ITexture 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RenderTexture
      The general workflow with a RenderTexture is: RenderTexture.init(GLState) -> RenderTexture.begin(GLState) -> RenderTexture.end(GLState) -> RenderTexture.destroy(GLState).
